attributes.action: Climate Emergency is here and now. UK Government must first, formally declare it
attributes.additional_details:
The State of the Climate and what we might do about it, Professor, Sir Nicholas Stern, https://www.ted.com/talks/lord_nicholas_stern_the_state_of_the_climate_and_what_we_might_do_about_it

100 Solutions to Reverse Global Warming, Chad Frischmann, https://www.ted.com/talks/chad_frischmann_100_solutions_to_climate_change?language=en

Global Warming of 1.5 degrees, IPCC - Summary for Policy Makers https://www.ipcc.ch/sr15/chapter/summary-for-policy-makers/
attributes.background: Climate Change projections over the next 12 yrs present the easiest choice we've ever had: A) Business-as-usual and catastrophic climate change for our children, B) Scale-up known solutions and create a liveable future. Government must declare a Climate Emergency and invest in all known solutions.
